fields.name: ExistsMessage
fields.fieldText: It looks like a global parent account already exist with that name. We'll be creating the Customer Account and Opportunity and related these records to the existing global parent account record. Click Next to proceed.

fields.name: Which_Type_of_Account_To_Create
fields.fieldText: Which Type of Account To Create?

fields.name: SuccessMessage
fields.fieldText:
Records successfully created!


Global Account Record: {!Global_Parent_Account}

Customer/Top Level Account Record: {!Customer_Top_Level_Account_Name}

Opportunity Record: {!Opportunity_Name}
